#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		int a, b, c;
		cin>>a>>b>>c;
		int num = a*1000+b*100+c*10;
		for(int i=9; i>0; i--)
		{
			num += i*10000;
			for(int j=9; j>=0; j--)
			{
				num += j;
				if(num%n == 0)
				{
					cout<<i<<" "<<j<<" "<<num/n<<endl;
					goto out;
				}
				num -= j;
			}
			num -= i*10000;
		}
		cout<<"0"<<endl;
		out:;
	}
	return 0;
}
